instructions.name: advance_protocol_epoch
docs: [V11] Advance the protocol treasury epoch.
Permissionless crank - calculates distributable amount above reserve floor.

instructions.name: borrow
docs: [V2.4] Borrow SOL from treasury using tokens as collateral.
Lock tokens in collateral vault, receive SOL up to 50% of collateral value.

accounts.name: collateral_vault
docs: Collateral vault - holds locked tokens. Created on first borrow for this token.

accounts.name: borrower_token_account
docs: Borrower's token account (source of collateral)

accounts.name: loan_position
docs: Loan position PDA - created on first borrow

accounts.name: pool_state
docs: Raydium pool state for price calculation

accounts.name: token_vault_0
docs: Pool token vault 0 (for reading reserves)

accounts.name: token_vault_1
docs: Pool token vault 1 (for reading reserves)

accounts.name: torch_vault
docs: [V18] Optional: Torch vault — collateral comes from vault ATA, SOL goes to vault

accounts.name: vault_wallet_link
docs: [V18] Optional: Proves borrower is authorized to use the vault

accounts.name: vault_token_account
docs: [V18] Optional: Vault's token ATA — collateral taken from here

instructions.name: buy
docs: Buy tokens from the bonding curve.

accounts.name: token_treasury
docs: Per-token treasury for buybacks [V2]

accounts.name: treasury_token_account
docs: [V13] Treasury's token account - holds vote vault tokens during bonding

accounts.name: user_stats
docs: [V4] Optional: User stats for volume tracking (platform rewards)
If platform_treasury is not initialized, these can be omitted

accounts.name: protocol_treasury
docs: [V13] Protocol treasury receives protocol fees (0.75% after dev split)

accounts.name: torch_vault
docs: [V14.1] Optional: Torch vault as SOL source (agent safety)
Passed explicitly — validated via vault_wallet_link constraint

accounts.name: vault_wallet_link
docs: [V14.1] Optional: Proves buyer is authorized to use the vault

accounts.name: vault_token_account
docs: [V18] Optional: Vault's token ATA — tokens go here instead of buyer's wallet
When present, torch_vault must also be present.

instructions.name: buyback
docs: [V2] Execute a buyback using treasury SOL (pre-migration, on bonding curve).

accounts.name: payer
docs: Anyone can trigger a buyback (permissionless)

accounts.name: token_treasury
docs: Per-token treasury with SOL for buybacks

instructions.name: claim_protocol_rewards
docs: [V11] Claim protocol rewards.
Users with >= 10 SOL volume in previous epoch can claim proportional share.

accounts.name: torch_vault
docs: [V20] Optional: Torch vault — receives claimed SOL

accounts.name: vault_wallet_link
docs: [V20] Optional: Proves user is authorized to use the vault

instructions.name: contribute_revival
docs: [V12] Contribute SOL to revive a reclaimed token.
When contributions reach 30 SOL, the token is automatically revived.

accounts.name: mint
docs: The mint of the reclaimed token

accounts.name: bonding_curve
docs: Bonding curve - must be reclaimed to accept revival contributions

instructions.name: create_token
docs: [V3] Create a new Token-2022 token with transfer fee extension.

accounts.name: treasury_token_account
docs: then buyback tokens post-migration. Created via CPI.

instructions.name: create_vault
docs: [V14] Create a per-user SOL vault for safe agent interaction.
The vault PDA enforces spending caps at the protocol level.
[V14.1] Also creates a VaultWalletLink for the creator.

accounts.name: wallet_link
docs: Auto-created wallet link for the creator

instructions.name: deposit_vault
docs: [V14] Deposit SOL into a vault. Anyone can deposit (multi-wallet).

instructions.name: execute_auto_buyback
docs: [V9] Execute automatic treasury buyback on Raydium DEX.
Monitors pool ratio and triggers buyback when price drops below threshold.
Permissionless - anyone can call (keeper/crank).

accounts.name: payer
docs: Anyone can trigger buyback (permissionless)

accounts.name: mint
docs: Token mint (mutable for burning)

accounts.name: bonding_curve
docs: Bonding curve (must be migrated)

accounts.name: treasury
docs: Token treasury (has SOL for buybacks)

accounts.name: treasury_wsol
docs: Treasury's WSOL account for swapping

accounts.name: treasury_token
docs: Treasury's token account for receiving bought tokens

accounts.name: amm_config
docs: Raydium AMM config

accounts.name: pool_state
docs: Raydium pool state

accounts.name: input_vault
docs: Pool's input vault (WSOL vault)

accounts.name: output_vault
docs: Pool's output vault (token vault)

accounts.name: wsol_mint
docs: WSOL mint

accounts.name: observation_state
docs: Raydium observation state

instructions.name: fund_vault_wsol
docs: [V19] Fund vault WSOL ATA with lamports from vault PDA.
Must be called before vault_swap (buy) in the same transaction.
Isolates direct lamport manipulation from CPIs to avoid runtime balance errors.

accounts.name: signer
docs: Controller wallet (linked to vault)

accounts.name: torch_vault
docs: Vault PDA (SOL source)

accounts.name: vault_wallet_link
docs: Vault wallet link (proves signer is authorized)

accounts.name: vault_wsol_account
docs: Vault's WSOL ATA (lamport destination)

instructions.name: harvest_fees
docs: [V3] Harvest accumulated transfer fees.

accounts.name: payer
docs: Anyone can harvest fees (permissionless)

accounts.name: token_treasury
docs: Token treasury PDA (withdraw authority for fees)

instructions.name: initialize
docs: Initialize the torch.market protocol.

instructions.name: initialize_protocol_treasury
docs: [V11] Initialize the protocol treasury PDA.
Protocol fees (0.5%) accumulate here with 1500 SOL reserve floor.

instructions.name: link_wallet
docs: [V14.1] Link a new wallet to a vault. Authority only.

instructions.name: liquidate
docs: [V2.4] Liquidate an underwater loan position.
Permissionless - anyone can call when LTV exceeds liquidation threshold.

accounts.name: liquidator
docs: Liquidator pays SOL to treasury, receives collateral tokens

accounts.name: collateral_vault
docs: Collateral vault - source of seized collateral

accounts.name: liquidator_token_account
docs: Liquidator's token account (receives seized collateral + bonus)

accounts.name: loan_position
docs: Loan position being liquidated

accounts.name: pool_state
docs: Raydium pool state for price calculation

accounts.name: token_vault_0
docs: Pool token vault 0

accounts.name: token_vault_1
docs: Pool token vault 1

accounts.name: torch_vault
docs: [V20] Optional: Torch vault — SOL paid from vault, collateral received to vault ATA

accounts.name: vault_wallet_link
docs: [V20] Optional: Proves liquidator is authorized to use the vault

accounts.name: vault_token_account
docs: [V20] Optional: Vault's token ATA — receives seized collateral + bonus

instructions.name: migrate_to_dex
docs: [V5] Migrate bonded token to Raydium CPMM DEX.
Creates a Raydium pool with locked liquidity (LP tokens burned).

accounts.name: payer
docs: Anyone can trigger migration (pays rent for new accounts)

accounts.name: global_config
docs: Global config for protocol settings

accounts.name: mint
docs: Token mint being migrated

accounts.name: bonding_curve
docs: Bonding curve being migrated

accounts.name: treasury
docs: Token treasury (pays 0.15 SOL migration fee from its balance)

accounts.name: token_vault
docs: Bonding curve token vault (source of tokens for LP)

accounts.name: treasury_token_account
docs: [V13] Treasury's token account - holds vote vault tokens to be returned or burned

accounts.name: payer_wsol
docs: Payer's WSOL account (created for migration, funded with bonding curve SOL)

accounts.name: payer_token
docs: Payer's token account (receives tokens from bonding curve)

accounts.name: amm_config
docs: Raydium AMM config

accounts.name: raydium_authority
docs: Raydium authority PDA

accounts.name: pool_state
docs: Raydium pool state PDA (created by Raydium via init)

accounts.name: wsol_mint
docs: WSOL mint

accounts.name: token_0_vault
docs: Pool token 0 vault (WSOL or token depending on ordering)

accounts.name: token_1_vault
docs: Pool token 1 vault

accounts.name: lp_mint
docs: LP token mint PDA (created by Raydium via init)

accounts.name: payer_lp_token
docs: Payer's LP token account (receives LP tokens, then burned)

accounts.name: observation_state
docs: Raydium observation state PDA (created by Raydium via init)

accounts.name: create_pool_fee
docs: Raydium fee receiver (receives 0.15 SOL)

instructions.name: reclaim_failed_token
docs: [V12] Reclaim SOL from a failed token (inactive for 1+ epochs).

accounts.name: protocol_treasury
docs: [V3.2] Protocol treasury receives reclaimed SOL (was platform_treasury)

instructions.name: repay
docs: [V2.4] Repay SOL debt and receive collateral back.
Partial repay reduces debt. Full repay returns all collateral and closes position.

accounts.name: collateral_vault
docs: Collateral vault - returns tokens on repay

accounts.name: borrower_token_account
docs: Borrower's token account (receives collateral back on full repay)

accounts.name: loan_position
docs: Loan position PDA

accounts.name: torch_vault
docs: [V18] Optional: Torch vault — SOL repaid from vault, collateral returned to vault ATA

accounts.name: vault_wallet_link
docs: [V18] Optional: Proves borrower is authorized to use the vault

accounts.name: vault_token_account
docs: [V18] Optional: Vault's token ATA — returned collateral goes here

instructions.name: sell
docs: Sell tokens back to the bonding curve.

accounts.name: token_treasury
docs: Per-token treasury receives sell fee [V2]

accounts.name: user_stats
docs: [V4] Optional: User stats for volume tracking (platform rewards)

accounts.name: protocol_treasury
docs: [V11] Optional: Protocol treasury receives protocol fees
If provided, fees go here instead of legacy wallet

accounts.name: torch_vault
docs: [V18] Optional: Torch vault as SOL destination (agent safety)

accounts.name: vault_wallet_link
docs: [V18] Optional: Proves seller is authorized to use the vault

accounts.name: vault_token_account
docs: [V18] Optional: Vault's token ATA — tokens sold from here instead of seller's wallet

instructions.name: star_token
docs: [V10] Star a token to show appreciation.
When 2000 stars is reached, auto-pays accumulated SOL to creator.

accounts.name: mint
docs: Token mint being starred

accounts.name: bonding_curve
docs: Bonding curve - to get creator address for auto-payout

accounts.name: token_treasury
docs: Token treasury receives star SOL and tracks stars

accounts.name: star_record
docs: Star record PDA - prevents double-starring

accounts.name: torch_vault
docs: [V18] Optional: Torch vault as SOL source (agent safety)

accounts.name: vault_wallet_link
docs: [V18] Optional: Proves user is authorized to use the vault

instructions.name: transfer_authority
docs: [V14.1] Transfer vault authority to a new wallet.
Does NOT affect wallet links.

instructions.name: unlink_wallet
docs: [V14.1] Unlink a wallet from a vault. Authority only.
Closes the VaultWalletLink PDA, returning rent to authority.

instructions.name: update_dev_wallet
docs: [V8] Update the dev wallet address.

instructions.name: vault_swap
docs: [V19] Vault-routed Raydium CPMM swap for migrated Torch tokens.
Controller wallet signs, vault PDA executes. Full custody preserved.
Handles both buy (SOL→Token) and sell (Token→SOL) via `is_buy` flag.

accounts.name: signer
docs: Controller wallet (linked to vault)

accounts.name: torch_vault
docs: Vault (SOL source/destination)

accounts.name: vault_wallet_link
docs: Vault wallet link (proves signer is authorized)

accounts.name: mint
docs: Token mint (mutable for Token-2022 transfer fee bookkeeping)

accounts.name: bonding_curve
docs: Bonding curve (validates this is a Torch token + migrated)

accounts.name: vault_token_account
docs: Vault's token ATA (Token-2022)
Token source (sell) or destination (buy)

accounts.name: vault_wsol_account
docs: Vault's WSOL ATA (SPL Token)
SOL source (buy) or destination (sell)

accounts.name: amm_config
docs: Raydium AMM config

accounts.name: pool_state
docs: Raydium pool state

accounts.name: pool_token_vault_0
docs: Pool token vault 0

accounts.name: pool_token_vault_1
docs: Pool token vault 1

accounts.name: observation_state
docs: Raydium observation state

accounts.name: wsol_mint
docs: WSOL mint

accounts.name: token_program
docs: SPL Token program (for WSOL operations)

accounts.name: token_2022_program
docs: Token-2022 program (for Torch token operations)

accounts.name: associated_token_program
docs: Associated Token Program (for WSOL ATA creation)

instructions.name: withdraw_tokens
docs: [V18] Withdraw tokens from vault ATA. Authority only.
Composability escape hatch for external DeFi usage.

accounts.name: vault_token_account
docs: Vault's token ATA (source)

accounts.name: destination_token_account
docs: Destination token account (any wallet's ATA)

instructions.name: withdraw_vault
docs: [V14.1] Withdraw SOL from vault. Authority only.

errors.name: NotToken2022
errors.msg: This operation requires a Token-2022 mint

errors.name: VoteRequired
errors.msg: Vote is required on first buy

errors.name: TokenStillActive
errors.msg: Token is still active, cannot reclaim yet

errors.name: BelowReclaimThreshold
errors.msg: Token SOL balance below reclaim threshold

errors.name: AlreadyClaimed
errors.msg: Already claimed rewards for this epoch

errors.name: NoVolumeInEpoch
errors.msg: No volume recorded in claimable epoch

errors.name: NotMigrated
errors.msg: Token not migrated to DEX yet

errors.name: InsufficientMigrationFee
errors.msg: Insufficient treasury balance for migration fee

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: Unauthorized - only authority can perform this action

errors.name: BaselineNotInitialized
errors.msg: Baseline must be initialized before auto buyback

errors.name: RatioAboveThreshold
errors.msg: Price above threshold - no buyback needed

errors.name: AtReserveFloor
errors.msg: Treasury at reserve floor - cannot execute buyback

errors.name: InsufficientVolumeForRewards
errors.msg: Insufficient volume for protocol rewards (need >= 10 SOL/epoch)

errors.name: TokenNotReclaimed
errors.msg: Token has not been reclaimed - cannot contribute to revival

errors.name: LendingNotEnabled
errors.msg: Lending is not enabled for this token

errors.name: LendingRequiresMigration
errors.msg: Token must be migrated to DEX before lending

errors.name: LendingCapExceeded
errors.msg: Treasury lending capacity exhausted (utilization cap reached)

errors.name: NotLiquidatable
errors.msg: Position is not liquidatable (LTV below threshold)

errors.name: EmptyBorrowRequest
errors.msg: Must provide collateral or borrow amount

errors.name: InvalidPoolAccount
errors.msg: Invalid Raydium pool account (wrong owner, vault, or mint)

errors.name: VaultUnauthorized
errors.msg: Unauthorized - only vault authority can perform this action

errors.name: WalletNotLinked
errors.msg: Wallet is not linked to any vault

errors.name: VaultWalletLinkMismatch
errors.msg: Wallet link does not point to the provided vault

errors.name: InvalidWsolAccount
errors.msg: Invalid WSOL account - must be vault's WSOL ATA

fields.name: creator

fields.name: virtual_token_reserves
docs: Virtual tokens for pricing

fields.name: real_sol_reserves
docs: Actual SOL in pool

fields.name: real_token_reserves
docs: Actual tokens available

fields.name: vote_vault_balance

Held in Treasury's token account until vote finalizes

fields.name: permanently_burned_tokens
docs: Tokens permanently burned via post-migration buybacks

fields.name: bonding_complete
docs: Reached bonding target

fields.name: bonding_complete_slot
docs: Slot when bonding completed

fields.name: votes_return
docs: Votes to return tokens

fields.name: votes_burn

fields.name: total_voters
docs: Total unique voters

fields.name: vote_finalized

fields.name: vote_result_return

fields.name: migrated

fields.name: is_token_2022
docs: Is Token-2022 mint (V3)

fields.name: last_activity_slot
docs: Last activity slot (buy/sell) for V4 inactivity tracking

fields.name: reclaimed

fields.name: name

fields.name: symbol

fields.name: uri
docs: Metadata URI

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump

fields.name: treasury_bump
docs: Treasury bump [V2]

fields.name: collateral_amount
docs: Tokens to lock as collateral (can be 0 if adding debt to existing position)

fields.name: sol_to_borrow
docs: SOL to borrow from treasury (can be 0 if just adding collateral)

fields.name: vote
docs: Vote on burned tokens fate. Required on first buy, must be None on subsequent buys.
true = return tokens to circulation, false = permanently burn them

types.name: GlobalConfig
docs: Global protocol configuration

fields.name: authority
docs: Protocol admin

fields.name: treasury
docs: Fee recipient (protocol fee 0.5%)

fields.name: dev_wallet
docs: Dev/RD wallet (receives 25% of treasury fee) [V8]

fields.name: _deprecated_platform_treasury
docs: [DEPRECATED V3.2] Was platform treasury. Kept for byte layout compatibility.

fields.name: protocol_fee_bps
docs: Fee in basis points

fields.name: paused
docs: Emergency pause

fields.name: total_tokens_launched
docs: Tokens launched counter

fields.name: total_volume_sol
docs: Cumulative SOL volume

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump

types.name: LoanPosition
docs: [V2.4] Per-user, per-token loan position for treasury lending
Created on first borrow. Tracks collateral locked and SOL owed.
Closed (rent reclaimed) on full repay or full liquidation.

fields.name: user
docs: Borrower wallet

fields.name: mint
docs: Token mint (for PDA derivation)

fields.name: collateral_amount
docs: Tokens locked as collateral in collateral vault

fields.name: borrowed_amount
docs: SOL principal owed (excludes accrued interest)

fields.name: accrued_interest
docs: Interest accumulated since last update

fields.name: last_update_slot
docs: Last slot when interest was calculated

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump

types.name: ProtocolTreasury
docs: [V11] Protocol-level treasury for fee distribution to active traders
Unlike GlobalConfig.treasury (a wallet), this is a PDA that:
- Receives 0.5% protocol fees from all trades
- Maintains a 1500 SOL reserve floor
- Distributes excess SOL weekly to users with >= 10 SOL epoch volume

fields.name: authority
docs: Protocol authority

fields.name: current_balance
docs: Current SOL balance held by this PDA

fields.name: reserve_floor
docs: Reserve floor - no payouts below this (1500 SOL)

fields.name: total_fees_received
docs: Total SOL ever received from protocol fees

fields.name: total_distributed
docs: Total SOL ever distributed to users

fields.name: current_epoch
docs: Current distribution epoch

fields.name: last_epoch_ts
docs: Timestamp of last epoch advance

fields.name: total_volume_current_epoch
docs: Total platform volume in current epoch

fields.name: total_volume_previous_epoch
docs: Total platform volume in previous epoch (for payout calculation)

fields.name: distributable_amount
docs: SOL available for distribution this epoch (balance - reserve_floor)

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump

types.name: RevivalContribution
docs: Emitted when someone contributes to a token revival

types.name: StarRecord
docs: Individual star record - prevents double-starring (V7, updated V10)

fields.name: user
docs: User who gave the star

fields.name: mint
docs: [V10] Token mint that received the star (was: creator)

fields.name: starred_at_slot
docs: Slot when star was given

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump

types.name: TokenRevived
docs: Emitted when a token is successfully revived

types.name: TorchVault
docs: [V14] Per-user SOL escrow for safe agent interaction.
[V14.1] Multi-wallet identity: one vault, many wallets.
The vault holds SOL earmarked for torch_market operations.
When present in a transaction, SOL is drawn from the vault
instead of the user's wallet. The vault PDA signs internal
CPI transfers. Anyone can deposit, only authority can withdraw.
Linked wallets can use the vault for buys.

fields.name: creator
docs: Immutable creator wallet — used as PDA seed (never changes)

fields.name: authority
docs: Current authority — controls withdraw, link/unlink, transfer

fields.name: sol_balance
docs: Available SOL in vault

fields.name: total_deposited
docs: Lifetime SOL deposited

fields.name: total_withdrawn
docs: Lifetime SOL withdrawn

fields.name: total_spent
docs: Lifetime SOL spent on torch operations

fields.name: total_received
docs: [V18] Lifetime SOL received back (sells, borrow proceeds)

fields.name: linked_wallets
docs: Number of wallets currently linked

fields.name: created_at
docs: Creation timestamp

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump

types.name: Treasury
docs: Per-token treasury for buybacks (V2, extended in V9, V10)

fields.name: bonding_curve
docs: Associated bonding curve

fields.name: mint
docs: Token mint

fields.name: sol_balance
docs: SOL balance available for buybacks

fields.name: total_bought_back
docs: Total tokens bought back

fields.name: total_burned_from_buyback
docs: Total tokens burned via buyback

fields.name: tokens_held
docs: Tokens held in treasury (after supply floor reached)

fields.name: last_buyback_slot
docs: Last buyback slot

fields.name: buyback_count
docs: Total buybacks executed

fields.name: harvested_fees
docs: Transfer fees harvested (V3)

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump

fields.name: baseline_sol_reserves
docs: Pool SOL reserves at migration time (baseline for ratio calculation)

fields.name: baseline_token_reserves
docs: Pool token reserves at migration time (baseline for ratio calculation)

fields.name: ratio_threshold_bps
docs: Ratio threshold in basis points (e.g., 8000 = 80%)
Buyback triggers when: current_ratio < baseline_ratio * (threshold / 10000)

fields.name: reserve_ratio_bps
docs: Reserve ratio in basis points (e.g., 3000 = 30%)
This percentage of treasury SOL is never spent on buybacks

fields.name: buyback_percent_bps
docs: Buyback amount per call in basis points (e.g., 1500 = 15%)
Each buyback call spends this percentage of available (non-reserved) SOL

fields.name: min_buyback_interval_slots
docs: Minimum slots between buyback calls

fields.name: baseline_initialized
docs: Whether baseline has been set (can only set once, at migration)

fields.name: total_stars
docs: Total stars received for this token

fields.name: star_sol_balance
docs: SOL accumulated from stars (separate from sol_balance for buybacks)

fields.name: creator_paid_out
docs: Whether creator has been paid out (one-time payout on threshold)

fields.name: total_sol_lent
docs: Total SOL currently lent out to borrowers

fields.name: total_collateral_locked
docs: Total tokens currently locked as collateral

fields.name: active_loans
docs: Number of active loan positions

fields.name: total_interest_collected
docs: All-time interest collected from loans

fields.name: lending_enabled
docs: Whether lending is enabled for this token (admin toggle)

fields.name: interest_rate_bps
docs: Interest rate per epoch in basis points (default: 200 = 2%)

fields.name: max_ltv_bps
docs: Maximum loan-to-value ratio in basis points (default: 5000 = 50%)

fields.name: liquidation_threshold_bps
docs: LTV threshold that triggers liquidation (default: 6500 = 65%)

fields.name: liquidation_bonus_bps
docs: Bonus collateral given to liquidator (default: 1000 = 10%)

fields.name: liquidation_close_bps
docs: Max percentage of position liquidatable per call (default: 5000 = 50%)

fields.name: lending_utilization_cap_bps
docs: Max percentage of treasury SOL that can be lent (default: 5000 = 50%)

types.name: UserPosition
docs: Per-user position for a token

fields.name: user
docs: User wallet

fields.name: bonding_curve
docs: Bonding curve reference

fields.name: total_purchased
docs: Gross tokens purchased

fields.name: tokens_received
docs: Net tokens received

fields.name: tokens_burned
docs: Tokens sent to burn

fields.name: total_sol_spent
docs: SOL spent

fields.name: has_voted
docs: Has voted

fields.name: vote_return
docs: Vote choice

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump

types.name: UserStats
docs: Per-user stats for platform-wide volume tracking and rewards (V4)

fields.name: user
docs: User wallet

fields.name: total_volume
docs: All-time SOL volume (buys + sells)

fields.name: volume_current_epoch
docs: Volume in current epoch

fields.name: volume_previous_epoch
docs: Volume in previous epoch (for claiming)

fields.name: last_epoch_claimed
docs: Last epoch user claimed rewards for

fields.name: total_rewards_claimed
docs: Total rewards claimed all-time

fields.name: last_volume_epoch
docs: Last epoch when volume was recorded (for lazy epoch transition)

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump

types.name: VaultWalletLink
docs: [V14.1] Reverse pointer linking a wallet to a vault.
PDA seed: [b"vault_wallet", wallet.key()] — one link per wallet.
Given any wallet, derive its VaultWalletLink PDA to find which vault it belongs to.

fields.name: vault
docs: The vault this wallet is linked to

fields.name: wallet
docs: The linked wallet

fields.name: linked_at
docs: When this link was created

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump
